articles.title: Kim Jong Un Elected as Delegate to WPK Conference
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Elected as Delegate to WPK Conference
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The conference of the Korean People's Army of the Workers' Party of Korea was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Monday.
					 Present there were delegates elected at the party organizations of the KPA units at all levels.
					
					 The delegates paid silent tribute to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The presidium was elected there.
					
					 The conference discussed the election of delegates to the WPK Conference.
					
					 Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made an address on electing Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un as a delegate to the WPK Conference.
					
					 The WPK Conference to be held in the significant year, the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, is a historic assembly powerfully demonstrating the revolutionary will of the WPK, the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un generation after generation and is of weighty significance in ushering in a great heyday of the revolution and construction under the uplifted banner of Songun, Kim Jong Gak noted, and continued:
					
					 The revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il who won victory after victory in the confrontation with imperialism, put the dignity of the DPRK on the highest level and laid an eternal foundation whereby Kim Il Sung's nation can enjoy immense happiness generation after generation will always go down in the history of the country.
					
					 Led by Kim Jong Un, the WPK is now called the most militant, dynamic and iron-willed party, a revolutionary party strong in organization, unity and principle and a mother party truly serving the people, striking its roots deep into them.
					
					 It is the highest honor, the greatest event and the biggest fortune of the KPA, the pillar and main force of the Songun revolution, to elect Kim Jong Un as a delegate to the WPK Conference at the current conference, reflecting the unanimous will and desire of all the service personnel.
					
					 The election of Kim Jong Un as a delegate to the WPK Conference is the service personnel's manifestation of their absolute trust and ardent loyalty to him and a reflection of the requirements of the era for the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving nation which have entered a new stage development.
					
					 Noting that it is a solemn pledge made by the KPA before the era and the revolution to accomplish the cause of Kim Il Sung and the cause of Kim Jong Il with arms, Kim Jong Gak courteously proposed to elect Kim Jong Un, the heart and future of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea, as a delegate to the WPK Conference, representing the unanimous will and desire of all the service personnel.
					
					 The floor was taken by Ri Yong Ho, Kim Won Hong, Jong Myong Do and other delegates of the party organizations of the KPA units at all levels.
					
					 The speakers said that Kim Jong Un possessed of intense loyalty to Kim Jong Il, outstanding leadership ability, matchless pluck and grit and noble virtues as inborn disposition is the supreme representative of the WPK, a symbol of the dignity and glory of the country and the nation and an ever-victorious banner of the KPA and the Korean people.
					
					  They fully supported and approved the proposal on electing Kim Jong Un as a delegate to the WPK Conference.
					
					 The conference unanimously adopted  a decision on electing Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the WPK, the state and the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK as a delegate to the WPK Conference, reflecting the will and desire of all the service personnel.
					
					 The conference elected delegates to the WPK Conference.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Extends Thanks to Servicepersons and People of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Extends Thanks to Servicepersons and People of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a message of thanks to all servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and people for expressing profound condolences over the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 In the message Kim Jong Un said he was deeply impressed to see all party members, servicepersons of the KPA and people fulfil their noble moral obligation in bitter grief over the loss of the father of the nation and strong yearning for him in the mourning period.
					
					 He noted he was deeply touched by the infinite loyalty manifested by all the service personnel and people to hold Kim Jong Il as the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution, missing him more fervently as the days go by, and drew enormous strength and courage from them. 
					
					 In the message he expressed warm thanks to all party members, service personnel and people and overseas compatriots for manifesting profound condolences over the passing of Kim Jong Il and turning out with redoubled courage in the efforts to implement his behests with strong yearning for him. 
					
					 He also said he felt very grateful to party and state leaders, prominent personages and progressive people of many countries for sending him hearty sympathy, expressing profound condolences upon hearing the sad news of the leader's passing. 
					
					 He will dedicate everything to socialist Korea and people entrusted to him by Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					 He is firmly convinced that all the party members, servicepersons and people will make great efforts to bring earlier the day when they will make a report of proud victory to President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who lie in state at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, single-mindedly united around the WPK Central Committee, he added

articles.title: U.S. Should Not Apply Double Standards to DPRK's Satellite Launch: FM Spokesman
articles.content:
U.S. Should Not Apply Double Standards to DPRK's Satellite Launch: FM Spokesman 
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Tuesday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards the U.S. president's unjust assertion over the DPRK's planned satellite launch:
					 The U.S. chief executive called the DPRK's planned launch of a satellite for development of science and technology for peaceful purposes a provocation threatening international peace and security. This reflects his wrong conception. 
					
					 The U.S. says that it has no hostility toward the DPRK, but it has not yet departed from the inveterate conception of confrontation. That is why it regards the launch of a satellite for peaceful purposes as a launch of long-range missile. 
					
					 The DPRK invited foreign experts and journalists to clearly observe its satellite launch so as to prove with transparency that it is part of scientific and technological work for peaceful use of space irrelevant to any military purpose. 
					
					 The DPRK also invited experts of the U.S. National Aeronautics Space Agency so that they can witness for themselves the peaceful nature of the satellite launch in the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK and the U.S. took much effort to sign an agreement, creating a favorable situation. There will be no reason whatsoever for the DPRK to launch a long-range missile at this time. 
					
					 It is the behests of General Secretary Kim Jong Il to launch a working satellite to mark the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and it is a routine work that was planned and has been pushed forward from long ago. 
					
					 At the DPRK-U.S. high-level talks, the DPRK consistently maintained that a moratorium on long-range missile launch does not include satellite launch for the peaceful purposes. As a result, the DPRK-U.S. agreement dated February 29 specified a moratorium on long-range missile launch, not "launch of long-range missile including satellite launch" or "launch with the use of ballistic missile technology". 
					
					   The DPRK will not give up the satellite launch for peaceful purposes, which is a legitimate right of a sovereign state and requirement essential for economic development
					
					 The U.S. chief executive said that he has no hostility toward the DPRK. If it was sincere, he should drop the confrontation conception of standing in the way of the DPRK, though belatedly, and make a bold decision to acknowledge that the DPRK also has a right to launch satellites. 
					
					 Whether the U.S. applies double standards to the DPRK's satellite launch or not will prove the sincerity of the U.S. chief executive's remarks.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Overseas Compatriots Delegations
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Overseas Compatriots Delegations
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter on March 26 from the members of the delegations of overseas compatriots who took part in the memorial service on the 100th day since General Secretary Kim Jong Il passed away.
					 They visited homeland under the particular concern of Kim Jong Un and received warm loving care they used to receive from Kim Jong Il, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who was born as the son of the guerrillas and grew up to be the outstanding strategist and peerlessly illustrious commander, never thought him as a special human being but lived an ordinary life of the son of the people.
					
					 The world history knows no such a leader as Kim Jong Il whose heart stopped beating on the running train in the middle of field guidance for the well-being and happiness of the country and the people.
					
					 We could rise up by turning the bitterest sorrow into thousand-fold strength and courage, bearing in mind the belief that he is always with us because we have you, another great leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will hold you in high esteem as the sun of the nation and the lodestar of national reunification with the one and the same mind with which we firmly believed in and followed Kim Jong Il despite the complicated situation abroad. 
					
					 We will make tangible contributions, material and moral, to the patriotic work to greet the forthcoming Day of the Sun as a great jubilee in the nation's history and a holiday common to mankind and thus carry out without fail the pledge we made in bitter tears before the bier of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Leaves for Cambodia
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Leaves for Cambodia
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation headed by Kim Chang Ryong, councilor of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, left here Tuesday to visit Cambodia.

articles.title: Publication of Books on Greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Observed
articles.content:
Publication of Books on Greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Observed
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to mark the publication of books on the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il. They are "Among the People" Vol. 100, "Glorifying the Era of Juche" Vol. 70 and "Reminiscences of Anti-Japanese Guerillas" Vol. 20.
					 The reminiscences comprehensively deal with the histories of glorious revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and tell about their wise leadership, noble virtues and undying feats.
					
					 A hundred volumes of "Among the People" contain more than 1,810 reminiscences, 20 volumes of "Reminiscences of Anti-Japanese Guerillas" some 440 reminiscences and 70 volumes of "Glorifying the Era of Juche" some 1,120 reminiscences.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam and other officials, mediapersons, related persons and officials and citizens in Pyongyang.
					
					 "Glorifying the Era of Juche" was awarded Kim Il Sung Prize and "Reminiscences of Anti-Japanese Guerillas" the People's Prize.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his report that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are lauded as the greatest men in history for their ideological and theoretical wisdom, leadership art and traits.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The collection of reminiscences serves as a powerful ideological weapon for training the party members, servicepersons, working people and youth and students as indomitable and ardent revolutionaries.
					
					 The books powerfully encourage the service personnel and people in their effort to fling open the gate to a thriving nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), Tuesday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 A wreath in the name of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon was laid before the portrait of a smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ro bowed to the portrait in humble reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: World Day of T.B. Observed in Pyongyang
articles.content:
World TB Day Observed in Pyongyang 
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The World Tuberculosis Day was observed at the People's Palace of Culture in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 Present in the event were officials of the Ministry of Public Health and health workers in the city, the representative of the World Health Organization (WHO) and members of its office and members of missions of international organizations here. 
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 Speakers underlined the need to increase public concern over the TB in line with themes set by WHO this year.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean scientific film
					
					"Tuberculosis" (Part 1). 
					
					 Then they looked around photos on display.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to centenarian Kim Ryong Gwan who resides in Sangchu-ri, Pakchon County in North Phyongan Province.
					 Before the liberation of Korea he had been subject to maltreatment and contempt as a tenant. It was only after the liberation of the country by President Kim Il Sung that he could lead a worthwhile life.
					
					 He worked heart and soul to implement the agricultural policy of the Workers' Party of Korea. He is still engaged in farming even though he retired on a pension.
					
					 He is requesting his descendants to work hard for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Xigang Meeting, Recorded in History of Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
articles.content:
Xigang Meeting, Recorded in History of Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- It was in late March Juche 26 (1937) that President Kim Il Sung convened a meeting in Xigang, Fusong County of China, an important meeting to be recorded in the history of the Korean people's anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 At that time the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule reached to the extremes in cruelty. They tried to exterminate the nationality of the Korean people, asserting that "Japan and Korea are one community" and "the Japanese and the Korean are of the same ancestry".
					
					 The situation urgently required the Korean revolutionaries to instill the people with conviction in a new life.
					
					 Kim Il Sung convened the meeting of military and political cadres of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in Xigang, at which he made a speech stressing the need to inspire the people with hope for national liberation by a large unit's advance into the homeland.
					
					 The speech was run through with his fixed will to bring a new surge in the revolution by overcoming difficulties with staunch offensive spirit and thus achieve the national liberation.
					
					 The KPRA's advance into the homeland would give confidence and pride to the Korean people and arouse them to valiantly turn out in the sacred war against the Japanese imperialists. This was what the President sought in the operation of advance into the homeland.
					
					 The meeting displayed his will to save the destiny of the nation with arms and put an end to the Japanese colonial rule.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (12)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (12)
Kim Il Sung, Ever-victorious Commander
					
					 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was an ever-victorious commander as well as an outstanding statesman, who won two wars against the Japanese and U.S. imperialists. 
					
					 On June 25, 1950 the U.S. imperialists started a war against the De
					He issued an order to launch an immediate and strong counterattack on the invaders.
					
					The counterattack strategy envisaged frustration of the invaders' offensives in a short time and switchover to counteroffensive in all fronts.
					
					In a little more than one month after the outbreak of war, the Korean People's Army (KPA) killed or captured 237,014 enemy troops, destroyed or captured 1,128 artillery guns, 387 tanks and armored vehicles and shot down or damaged 386 war planes, seizing more than 90 percent of south Korean areas inhabited with 92 percent of population.
					
					At that time, the President successfully commanded an oper
					mocratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 The President convened an emergency meeting of the Cabinet that day, appealing to all the people to turn out in a war of justice to defend the independence of the country and freedom and honor of the nation.
						ation to liberate Taejon by employing an encirclement tactics.
					
					As the KPA was in a temporary retreat, he gave an order on launching military actions behind the enemy lines at a powwow of the KPA Supreme Command on September 25, 1950. 
					
					 In response to his order, KPA units fought battles in full scale in the enemy rear, laying big hurdles to their northward advance. 
					
					 In the fourth-stage war, he instructed KPA units to switch over to warfare in positions, calling on the units to build tunnels to defend them from enemy's bombing.
					
					 The advantage of the tunnel tactics was vividly illustrated in fierce battles on Height 1,211. 
					
					 The U.S. heavy bombardment could not give casualties to KPA soldiers in tunnels.
					
					On December 29, 1950 Kim Il Sung directed all units of the KPA to organize aircraft-hunting teams to overpower enemy's warplanes. The aircraft-hunting teams shot down as many as 3,000 planes in less than two years. 
					
					 He also initiated organizing tank-hunting teams in all units on August 24, 1951.
					
					 The President saw to it that snipers' teams were organized throughout the units.
					
					His Juche-based tactics resulted in victories in all battles in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 At last the war ended in the DPRK's victory on July 27, 1953.
					
					The victory paved a way to a setback of the U.S. forces for the first time in history.
					
					 The world people lauded him as an unheard-of hero and steersman of anti-imperialist struggle, who defeated the U.S. imperialists and troops from their 15 allies.
					
					 Later, the then commander-in-chief of the UN Forces, Clark, wrote that General Kim Il Sung's superb commandership led to the victory of the north Korean army.

articles.title: Japan's Bid for UNSC Permanent Membership Ridiculed: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Japan's Bid for UNSC Permanent Membership Ridiculed: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- There took place negotiations for reforming the UNSC the keynote of which is to increase its permanent members at the UN Headquarters on March 13.
					 As regards the issue of Japan's bid for its permanent membership discussed at the negotiations, the DPRK representative said that Japan has no qualification to become its permanent member because of its insincere attitude toward its past crimes. But the Japanese representative talked rubbish that the DPRK's demand for Japan's redemption of past wrongs "is irrelevant to the nature of the negotiations" and "it is diverting elsewhere the discussion on the issue."
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Except for other countries, Japan can never become a permanent member of the UNSC.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that Japan is not qualified to hold such responsible post at the UN, the commentary goes on:
					
					 As already known to the world, Japan is a criminal state as it invaded Korea and other Asian countries and imposed unspeakable misfortunes and pains upon their people in the past. Japan has refused to make due apology and reparation to the victims for them though more than six decades have passed since the war. On the contrary, it has worked hard overtly and covertly to embellish its blood-stained history of crimes and realize its wild ambition for militarist overseas expansion.
					
					 Japan, politically and morally immature, eyes the above-said responsible post at the UN. This reminds one of a child insisting that he should get married. This cannot but be another political caricature.
					
					 Japan had better get fully mature politically and morally and win confidence from the international community before eyeing anything. To this end, Japan should settle its crime-woven past, among other things.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Party Can Never Escape from Punishment: Opposition Party Official
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Party Can Never Escape from Punishment: Opposition Party Official
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Mun Jae In, permanent adviser of the opposition Democratic United Party of south Korea, on March 23 criticized the authorities' unpopular rule.
					 He deplored the people's livelihood getting worse and worse.
					
					 The present "government" is to blame for preference granted to big businesses, tax reduction for the rich and discrimination against part-time workers that plague society, he said.
					
					 Such unfair policies now in force by the Lee Myung Bak "government" are numerous, he said.
					
					  Park Geun Hye has changed the name of the ruling party to escape from people's punishment, but she can never shirk off the responsibility for the state policy failure, he said. 
					
					 No matter how desperately the ruling party may try to cover up its crime, it can never escape from punishment, he stressed.

articles.title: War Exercises Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
War Exercises Censured in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) held a press conference in Seoul on Mar. 23 at which it accused the "government" authorities of staging madcap saber-rattling against the DPRK.
					 Speakers at the conference slammed the authorities for committing hideous provocations and frantically staging large-scale war exercises to invade the north in collusion with the U.S., creating a touch-and-go situation.
					
					 They held that the saber-rattling should be halted at once.
					
					 They called upon all the compatriots to struggle in unity to foil the moves of the anti-reunification forces for a war and escalated confrontation.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak Accused of Defending Sexual Slavery Enforced by Japan
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak Accused of Defending Sexual Slavery Enforced by Japan
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Yun Mi Hyang, permanent representative of the Council for a Solution to the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps in south Korea, and Han Kuk Yom, co-representative of the council, made public a statement on Mar. 23 assailing the reckless remarks of traitor Lee Myung Bak disregarding the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The statement accused Lee Myung Bak of asserting that the issue of comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army "should be solved in a humanitarian manner rather than in a legal manner" at a press conference on Mar. 21.
					
					 The statement said the organization could not repress resentment at the reckless remarks supporting the stand of Japan evading the legal responsibility for the sexual slavery.
					
					 The sexual slavery enforced by Japan in the past is an issue which the Japanese government should settle in a legal way.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak must reflect on his reckless remarks and strongly urge the Japanese government to make an apology and reparation for its crimes.

articles.title: Strong Protest against Nuclear Security Summit Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Strong Protest against Nuclear Security Summit Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A rally was held at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station on Monday to denounce the south Korean puppet regime for kicking up anti-DPRK nuclear racket and war confrontation moves.
					 More than 5 000 people from all walks of life including workers, peasants, youth and students took part in it.
					
					 At the rally the speakers accused the "government" authorities of bringing dark clouds of war to hang over Korea with the "Nuclear Security Summit" as an occasion while inflicting sufferings upon the common people by driving them to the streets.
					
					 After the Cheonan warship incident the authorities have shipped into south Korea lots of weapons for aggression from the U.S. and are now rendering the situation tense by kicking up such anti-DPRK racket as the "Nuclear Security Summit", the speakers said.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" should be forced to step down, they noted, adding they would turn the forthcoming general election into a trial of judging the Lee "government" and "Saenuri Party." 
					
					 At the end of the rally they staged a demonstration holding the slogan-boards reading "Myung Bak, Step down" and "Oppose the Nuclear Security Summit".

articles.title: Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held in Russia on 100th Day Since His Demise
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held in Russia on 100th Day Since His Demise
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Far East of Russia held a memorial service for General Secretary Kim Jong Il in Nakhodka City on Saturday on the 100th day since his demise. 
					 Placed before the portrait of Kim Jong Il hung on the front wall of the venue of the memorial service were a wreath in the name of the confederation and bouquets. 
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il in humblest reverence.
					
					 They watched video "Korea says in bitter tears". 
					
					 The vice-chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Maritime Territory of the Russian Federation said that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state and satellite producer and launcher which no one can dare provoke, adding that the exploits performed by him would be conveyed down to posterity. 
					
					 The chairman of the Korean Autonomous Society for National Culture in Nakhodka said that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the country and its people and the nation, traversing rugged paths without having any good rest. 
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia said that the greatest exploit of Kim Jong Il was that he successfully solved the issue of the continuity of the revolutionary cause.

articles.title: Koreans in China Decry Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Nuclear Racket
articles.content:
Koreans in China Decry Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Confrontation Racket
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on Mar. 23 hitting out at the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its anti-DPRK confrontation. 
					 It accused traitor Lee Myung Bak of openly expressing his intentions to make a fuss with the "north's nuclear issue" at the nuclear security summit. The traitor also found fault with the DPRK's projected launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-3 for peaceful purposes, calling it a "serious provocation", the statement said.
					
					 The real purpose sought by the group is to intensify the confrontation and war racket to tide over the serious ruling crisis of the conservative forces and turn the bad situation for general elections into one favorable to it, the statement added.
					
					 The brigandish logic, by which it calls the satellite launch by it and other countries legal while that by the DPRK illegal, can no longer work, the statement said.
					
					 Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the association, made public a similar statement on Mar. 24.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Books and a collection of poems were published in Bangladesh to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung. They are books "Songun international", "The DPRK I saw -- the country centered on the popular masses", "Great man and immortality" and a collection of poems "A hymn dedicated to a great man."
					The book "Songun international" was written by M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, which consists of "1. Kim Il Sung, leader I worship", "2. Kim Jong Il, brilliant commander I eagerly want to meet" and "3. Songun international."
					
					The book deals with the sacred revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung and the immortal feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					Nothing can quell the ardent desire of humankind and strong trend of the times to follow the invincible Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, it noted.
					
					The book "The DPRK I saw -- the country centered on the popular masses" was written by Raymond Ferguson, national secretary of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture. It deals with the advantage of socialism in the DPRK which is shedding its rays all over the world thanks to the peerlessly great men possessed of immensely sublime outlook on people.
					
					The book "Great man and immortality" was authored by Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League. It consists of chapters "Brilliant life", "Weight of earth and Kim Il Sung", "The sun is immortal" and "Peerlessly great man and eternal life." 
					
					The author praises the immortal revolutionary career of the President, who founded the Juche idea and successfully embodied it to develop the DPRK into a powerful country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence.
					
					The collection of poems "A hymn dedicated to a great man" written by Bangladeshi poet Chowdhry contains more than 40 poems including "We pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung on the Day of the Sun", "Comrade Kim Jong Il -- happiness for world people", "In memory of Kim Jong Suk" and "Invincible DPRK -- our beacon of hope".
					
					Those poems laud the personalities of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu as peerlessly great persons and depict the real picture of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Kim Hyong Jik's Exploits Posted on Internet Homepage in Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Hyong Jik's Exploits Posted on Internet Homepage in Guinea
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Guinean Press Association posted on Mar. 20 an article "The Historic Road at Dawn" on its Internet homepage to mark the 95th anniversary of the Korean National Association (KNA).
					 March 23 this year marked the 95th anniversary of the KNA formed by Kim Hyong Jik, outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The undying exploits performed by him in the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea are always remembered by the Korean people. 
					
					 The idea of "Jiwon" (aim high) reflected the spirit of national independence, indomitable revolutionary spirit and the idea that the Koreans should achieve the independence of the country by their own efforts, struggling generation after generation. 
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik formed the KNA, the biggest anti-Japanese underground revolutionary organization strongest in the anti-imperialist independent stand at that time, on Mar. 23 1917. 
					
					 Even though he died so early, he left noble legacies behind him. They were the ideas of aiming high, getting ready for three contingencies (death from hunger, death from a beating and death from the cold) and recruiting comrades and a pair of pistols.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il inherited the idea of "Jiwon", translating the desire of Kim Hyong Jik into a brilliant reality, concluded the article.

articles.title: DPRK's Plan for Satellite Launch Supported in Ecuador, Peru
articles.content:
DPRK's Plan for Satellite Launch Supported in Ecuador, Peru
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Ecuador and Peru supported the DPRK's plan for launching Kwangmyongsong-3, an earth observation satellite.
					 The Ecuadorian National Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of the Birth of President Kim Il Sung, the Ecuador－Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People and the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador said in a joint statement on March 20:
					
					 The satellite launch will be a great event strikingly demonstrating the national power of socialist Korea and a pride of the world people looking up to the DPRK as a beacon of socialism and a symbol of justice.
					
					 Some hostile forces are claiming that the projected launch of Kwangmyongsong-3 is a "missile launch" and "a violation of UNSC resolution" but this is a base act of encroaching upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 We fully hail and support the plan for launching Kwangmyogsong-3 and express invariable solidarity with the Korean people in their just cause.
					
					 The Peruvian－Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship in an article posted on its Internet homepage on March 21 bitterly denounced the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK, economic blockade and moves to obstruct the satellite launch, adding that the right to use space is not a monopoly of big powers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was brought out in booklet by the Canta Clara Publishing House in Venezuela on March 18.
					 The work, published on July 26, 1996, clarifies the idea that the Juche philosophy is an original philosophy evolved and systematized with its peculiar principles and a revolutionary and popular philosophy which truly serves the purpose of the struggle of the popular masses for independence.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to study, explain and disseminate the Juche philosophy as required by the intention of the Party and thoroughly apply it to revolutionary practice.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed by Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed by Mexican Organization
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism issued bulletin No. 68 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The bulletin carried a portrait of the smiling President and an article captioned "Tribute paid to President Kim Il Sung."
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The people who visit the DPRK can see any time Korean people laying bouquets and paying tribute in reverence to the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill located in the centre of Pyongyang.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il started his annual work with paying tribute to the President.
					
					 The endless field guidance tour made by him was filled with his boundless reverence for the President.
					
					 Thanks to his immutable will to invariably carry forward and glorify the valuable feats performed by the President the DPRK could win victory in defending socialism in adversity toward the end of the last century and glorify the first decade of the new century with eye-opening feats in building a thriving nation.
					
					 His leadership for building a thriving nation has been oriented to most successfully realizing the lifetime desire and ideal of the President.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is always alive enjoying boundless reverence of all people.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK and the Group for the Study of Juche Philosophy and Songun Politics of Malta posted articles on internet homepages on Mar. 18 and 19 to mark the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: 2 Dead in Shootings in U.S.
articles.content:
7 Dead in Shootings in U.S.
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Two people were killed and three others wounded in a shooting incident occurred in a tire store in the U.S. state of North Carolina on Friday afternoon.
					 Five people (two men and three women) were found dead in a house in the western U.S. port city of San Francisco on Friday morning, in what police described as a gun-related murder-suicide case. 
					
					 A series of shootings are throwing society into uneasiness and fear.

articles.title: Economic Depression in Japan
articles.content:
Economic Depression in Japan
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Crude steel production in Japan totaled 8.61 million tons in February, down 3.7 percent from a year earlier for the sixth straight month of decline, the Japan Iron and Steel Federation said Wednesday.
					 The value of exports fell 2.7 percent from a year earlier, the Finance Ministry said in a preliminary report.

articles.title: U.S. Forces in S. Korea Plagued by Drug-related Crimes
articles.content:
U.S. Forces in S. Korea Plagued by Drug-related Crimes
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea are plagued by drug-related crimes.
					 It was revealed that three GIs under the U.S. 8th Army in south Korea sold off drugs in Tongduchon, Kyonggi Province, and in various areas of Seoul from March 15 to 21.

articles.title: Russia Urges U.S. to Show Clear Reaction over MD
articles.content:
Russia Urges U.S. to Show Clear Reaction over MD
 Moscow, March 26 (KCNA) -- Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov, foreign minister of Russia, urged the United States to show explicit reaction towards Russia's concerns about the missile defense system (MD).
					 He said the U.S. attempt to establish the missile defense system has caused more serious problems in Asian countries including China, to say nothing of Europe. He insisted the technical talks related to this issue should go on in a sincere manner.
					
					 The U.S. should discuss all the concerns with Russia and give clear-cut answers to Russia's questions, he urged.

articles.title: Cooperation among Different Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Different Countries
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of China and Zimbabwe's ruling party ZANU-PF agreed on Friday to step up bilateral party-to-party cooperation in the new era.
					 On the same day Croatia and Serbia signed a protocol on restitution of cultural assets from Serbia to Croatia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un fue electo como delegado a la conferencia del PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un fue electo como delegado a la conferencia del PTC
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la reunion de los delegados del Ejercito Popular de Corea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					A la ocasion asistieron los delegados elegidos en las organizaciones del partido de las unidades a todos los niveles del EPC. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El foro eligio la presidencia y discutio la agenda de elegir a los delegados a la Conferencia del PTC.
					
					El discurso de propuesta estuvo a cargo del primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Kim Jong Gak, quien dijo: 
					
					La Conferencia del PTC, que tendra lugar en este ano significativo del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el septuagesimo aniversario de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, es una reunion historica de gran importancia para manifestar plenamente la voluntad revolucionaria del PTC, el EPC y el pueblo coreano de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Songun de tipo jucheano siguiendo la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, y abrir la era de prosperidad de la revolucion y la construccion enarbolando la bandera del Songun. 
					
					Quedaran eternamente en la historia de la patria la vida y las hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente  Kim Jong Il quien logro victorias sucesivas en la confrontacion con los imperialistas, elevo al maximo la dignidad de Corea y preparo el fundamento de eterna duracion para la felicidad de la nacion de  Kim Il Sung.
					
					Hoy dia, gracias a tener al Maximo Dirigente    Kim Jong Un en el puesto supremo, el PTC se llama como partido de acero mas combativo, vigoroso y revolucionario, fuerte en la organizacion, la unidad y los principios y como partido madre que sirve al pueblo echando sus profundas raices en lo profundo de las masas populares.
					
					Elegir al Maximo Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC, reflejando la unanime voluntad y deseo de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC, es la maxima gloria y gran fortuna del EPC, pilar y grueso de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, deviene la absoluta confianza y ardiente la fidelidad hacia el de los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el reflejo de la demanda de la epoca para lograr el triunfo de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la de construccion de Estado prospero en una nueva etapa de desarrollo. 
					
					Llevar a feliz termino con armas la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, es el juramento del EPC tomado ante la epoca y la revolucion. 
					
					Por ultimo, en reflejo de la unanime voluntad y deseo de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC, el orador propuso cortesmente elegir al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, corazon y futuro de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y Corea de Kim Jong Il, como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC.
					
					Luego, intervinieron Ri Yong Ho, Kim Won Hong, Jong Myong Do y otros delegados de las organizaciones del partido a todos niveles del EPC.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que el Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un, que encarna la absoluta fidelidad al Dirigente, la destacada capacidad directiva, la audacia y el coraje extraordinarios y la noble virtud, es el maximo representante del PTC, simbolo de la dignidad y la gloria de la patria y nacion y la bandera invencible del ejercito y pueblo coreanos. 
					
					Y aprobaron totalmente la propuesta de elegir al Maximo Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia.
					
					En la ocasion quedo aprobada por unanimidad la resolucion sobre la eleccion de Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del PTC, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas, como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC, en reflejo de unanime voluntad y aspiracion de todos los oficiales y los soldados del EPC.
					
					Luego, fueron electos otros delegados a la Conferencia del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un expresa agradecimiento a los militares y habitants
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un expresa agradecimiento a los militares y habitantes
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 26 un mensaje de agradecimiento a los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y otros habitantes que expresaron profundas condolencias por el deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					En su mensaje, Kim Jong Un senalo que se quedo muy impresionado de la imagen de todos los militantes del partido, oficiales y soldados del EPC y habitantes que en el periodo de duelo, cumplieron su noble obligacion moral expresando el profundo pesar por la perdida del Dirigente, padre de la nacion, y la gran anoranza a el.
					
					Subrayo que le ha estimulado y animado mucho la  fidelidad inmaculada de todo el ejercito y el pueblo decididos a enaltecer a Kim Jong Il como eterno Dirigente del partido y la revolucion extranandolo cada dia mas.
					
					Expreso calido agradecimiento a todos los militantes del partido, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular, habitantes y los compatriotas en ultramar quienes expresaron profundas condolencias por el fallecimiento de Kim Jong Il y se levantan unanimemente con el coraje centuplicado en la materializacion de sus legados.
					
					Manifesto la gratitud tambien a los jefes de partido y Estado, las personalidades celebres y los pueblos progresistas de muchos paises del mundo por las profundas condolencias y sincera compasion.
					
					Subrayo que dedicaria todo lo suyo por la patria socialista y el pueblo que le ha encomendado el Dirigente.
					
					Finalmente, expuso la conviccion de que todos los militantes del partido, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y habitantes, unidos con la unica alma en torno al Comite Central del Partido, lucharan con mas vigor por adelantar el dia en que podran dar el parte de victoria al Presidente       Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Palacio del Sol de Kumsusan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de compatriotas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de compatriotas 
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le dirigieran el dia 26 los miembros de la delegacion de compatriotas en ultramar quienes han participado en los actos por el 100o dia de fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Los remitentes senalan que al visitar la patria gracias a la benevolencia especial del destinatario, recibieron el gran amor y beneficios que dispensaba el padre General Kim Jong Il.
					
					El Dirigente, nacido como hijo de la guerrilla y crecido como destacado estratega militar y general insigne nunca visto, vivio toda su vida como un hijo del pueblo, afirman.
					
					Prosiguen que en la historia de la humanidad no habia otro lider igual al Dirigente quien fallecio en el camino de orientacion en tren por la seguridad y la felicidad de la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					Gracias a tener al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, los compatriotas en ultramar pudieron levantarse con la ferrea conviccion de que el Generalisimo        Kim Jong Il vive siempre en nosotros convirtiendo la tristeza mas dolorosa en las fuerzas y coraje de mil veces, destacan.
					
					Apoyaremos invariablemente al Maximo Dirigente como Sol de la nacion y lucero de la reunificacion de la patria, con el mismo sentimiento de haber apoyado y confiado solo al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il, enfatizan. 
					
					Manifiestan la decision de hacer una especial contribucion material y espiritual a la labor para acoger el Dia del Sol que viene como un gran jubilo nacional y la fiesta comun de la humanidad y de cumplir sin falta el juramento tomado ante el feretro del fallecido Dirigente.

articles.title: MINRX rechaza la pauta de doble rasero en el lanzamiento de satelite
articles.content:
MINRX rechaza la pauta de doble rasero en el lanzamiento de satelite 
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que el presidente estadounidense acuso injustamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de su plan de lanzamiento del satelite artificial con fines pacificos, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 27 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC: 
					El maximo gobernante de Estados Unidos censuro el plan de la RPDC de lanzar el satelite cientifico-tecnico con fines pacificos como "provocacion que amenaza la paz y la seguridad internacionales", lo cual parte de un concepto erroneo. 
					
					EE.UU. habla de que su pais no tiene la voluntad hostil a la RPDC, pero no se ha liberado de la anacronica concepcion de enfrentamiento, razon por la cual considera el lanzamiento  de tal satelite de esta como lanzamiento de misil de largo alcance.
					
					Para mostrar con transparencia que el lanzamiento del satelite no tiene nada que ver con algun  objetivo militar sino es una labor cientifico-tecnica para el uso pacifico del cosmos, hemos invitado hasta a los especialistas y periodistas de otros paises. 
					
					Puesto que hemos invitado a los especialistas de la Administracion Nacional de Aeronauta y del Espacio de EE.UU., ellos podran confirmar con sus propios ojos en nuestro pais el lanzamiento del satelite con fines pacificos. 
					
					La RPDC ha aprobado dificilmente el acuerdo con EE.UU. y hecho transcurrir favorablemente tambien la situacion. Por eso no tiene ninguna razon ni necesidad de lanzar misil  de largo alcance.
					
					Lanzar un satelite de usos practicos con motivo del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung es el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y una labor normal planeada y promovida desde hace mucho tiempo. 
					
					En las conversaciones de alto nivel RPDC-EE.UU. hemos insistido invariablemente en que el lanzamiento del satelite artificial con fines pacificos no se incluye a la suspension provisional del lanzamiento de misil de largo alcance. Como resultado, en el acuerdo del 29 de febrero RPDC-EE.UU. esta anotada la "suspension provisional del lanzamiento de misil de largo alcance", lejos de "lanzamiento de misil de largo alcance incluso el de satelite" o "lanzamiento mediante el uso de la tecnologia de misil balistico". 
					
					No renunciaremos jamas el lanzamiento del satelite con fines pacificos que constituye el derecho legitimo de Estado soberano y el requisito para el desarrollo de la economia. 
					
					Si el maximo gobernante estadounidense no tiene la voluntad hostil a la RPDC, como dijo, debe liberarse de la concepcion de enfrentamiento de dimpedir el avance de esta y reconocer con bravura que la RPDC tambien tiene, al igual que otros paises, el derecho a lanzar el satelite. 
					
					Se distinguira la sinceridad de la hipocresia de las palabras del maximo gobernante estadounidense, segun EE.UU. aplique o no la pauta de doble rasero sobre el lanzamiento del satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC.

articles.title: Acto dedicado a publicacion de libros sobre grandes hombres
articles.content:
Acto dedicado a publicacion de libros sobre grandes hombres
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este martes en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto dedicado a las publicaciones de libro "Entre el pueblo" (tomo 100), "Para glorificar la era del Juche" (tomo 70) y "Reminiscencias de los guerrilleros  antijaponeses" (tomo 20).
					Las colecciones de reminiscencias sintetizan la gloriosa historia de actividades revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y recopilan las orientaciones sabias, nobles virtudes e imborrables hazanas de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu.
					
					El libro "Entre el pueblo" (1-100) contiene mas de mil 810 reminiscencias, el otro "Para glorificar la era del Juche" (1-70), mas de mil 120 recuerdos  y "Reminiscencias de los guerrilleros antijaponeses" (1-20), mas de 440 memorias.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, los funcionarios de sectores de prensa e informacion, los hombres relacionados y los funcionarios y los trabajadores de esta ciudad.
					
					Fueron otorgados el Premio Kim Il Sung a "Para glorificar la era del Juche", y el Premio del Pueblo a "Reminiscencias de los guerrilleros antijaponeses".
					
					En su informe de la ocasion, Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, destaco que el Presidente y el Dirigente son los grandes hombres sin precedentes en la historia tanto en su perspicacia ideo-teorica como en su capacidad directiva y cualidades.
					
					Las colecciones sirven de poderosa arma ideologica que forma a los militantes del PTC, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los jovenes y estudiantes como combatientes indoblegables y revolucionarios fervientes.
					
					Ademas estimulan la lucha del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos por abrir las puertas al Estado prospero bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
